00075 static DdNode * zddPortFromBddStep ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *B, int expected));
00076 static DdNode * zddPortToBddStep ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, int depth));

00102 DdNode *
00103 Cudd_zddPortFromBdd(
00104   DdManager * dd,
00105   DdNode * B)
00106 {
00107     DdNode *res;
00108 
00109     do {
00110         dd->reordered = 0;
00111         res = zddPortFromBddStep(dd,B,0);
00112     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00113 
00114     return(res);
00115 
00116 } /* end of Cudd_zddPortFromBdd */

00131 DdNode *
00132 Cudd_zddPortToBdd(
00133   DdManager * dd,
00134   DdNode * f)
00135 {
00136     DdNode *res;
00137 
00138     do {
00139         dd->reordered = 0;
00140         res = zddPortToBddStep(dd,f,0);
00141     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00142 
00143     return(res);
00144 
00145 } /* end of Cudd_zddPortToBdd */

00168 static DdNode *
00169 zddPortFromBddStep(
00170   DdManager * dd,
00171   DdNode * B,
00172   int  expected)
00173 {
00174     DdNode      *res, *prevZdd, *t, *e;
00175     DdNode      *Breg, *Bt, *Be;
00176     int         id, level;
00177 
00178     /* Terminal cases. */
00179     if (B == Cudd_Not(DD_ONE(dd)))
00180         return(DD_ZERO(dd));
00181     if (B == DD_ONE(dd)) {
00182         if (expected >= dd->sizeZ) {
00183             return(DD_ONE(dd));
00184         } else {
00185             return(dd->univ[expected]);
00186         }
00187     }
00188 
00189     Breg = Cudd_Regular(B);
00190 
00191     /* Computed table look-up. */
00192     res = cuddCacheLookup1Zdd(dd,Cudd_zddPortFromBdd,B);
00193     if (res != NULL) {
00194         level = cuddI(dd,Breg->index);
00195         /* Adding DC vars. */
00196         if (expected < level) {
00197             /* Add suppressed variables. */
00198             cuddRef(res);
00199             for (level--; level >= expected; level--) {
00200                 prevZdd = res;
00201                 id = dd->invperm[level];
00202                 res = cuddZddGetNode(dd, id, prevZdd, prevZdd);
00203                 if (res == NULL) {
00204                     Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, prevZdd);
00205                     return(NULL);
00206                 }
00207                 cuddRef(res);
00208                 Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, prevZdd);
00209             }
00210             cuddDeref(res);
00211         }
00212         return(res);
00213     }   /* end of cache look-up */
00214 
00215     if (Cudd_IsComplement(B)) {
00216         Bt = Cudd_Not(cuddT(Breg));
00217         Be = Cudd_Not(cuddE(Breg));
00218     } else {
00219         Bt = cuddT(Breg);
00220         Be = cuddE(Breg);
00221     }
00222 
00223     id = Breg->index;
00224     level = cuddI(dd,id);
00225     t = zddPortFromBddStep(dd, Bt, level+1);
00226     if (t == NULL) return(NULL);
00227     cuddRef(t);
00228     e = zddPortFromBddStep(dd, Be, level+1);
00229     if (e == NULL) {
00230         Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, t);
00231         return(NULL);
00232     }
00233     cuddRef(e);
00234     res = cuddZddGetNode(dd, id, t, e);
00235     if (res == NULL) {
00236         Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, t);
00237         Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, e);
00238         return(NULL);
00239     }
00240     cuddRef(res);
00241     Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, t);
00242     Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, e);
00243 
00244     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_zddPortFromBdd,B,res);
00245 
00246     for (level--; level >= expected; level--) {
00247         prevZdd = res;
00248         id = dd->invperm[level];
00249         res = cuddZddGetNode(dd, id, prevZdd, prevZdd);
00250         if (res == NULL) {
00251             Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, prevZdd);
00252             return(NULL);
00253         }
00254         cuddRef(res);
00255         Cudd_RecursiveDerefZdd(dd, prevZdd);
00256     }
00257 
00258     cuddDeref(res);
00259     return(res);
00260 
00261 } /* end of zddPortFromBddStep */

00275 static DdNode *
00276 zddPortToBddStep(
00277   DdManager * dd /* manager */,
00278   DdNode * f /* ZDD to be converted */,
00279   int  depth /* recursion depth */)
00280 {
00281     DdNode *one, *zero, *T, *E, *res, *var;
00282     unsigned int index;
00283     unsigned int level;
00284 
00285     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00286     zero = DD_ZERO(dd);
00287     if (f == zero) return(Cudd_Not(one));
00288 
00289     if (depth == dd->sizeZ) return(one);
00290 
00291     index = dd->invpermZ[depth];
00292     level = cuddIZ(dd,f->index);
00293     var = cuddUniqueInter(dd,index,one,Cudd_Not(one));
00294     if (var == NULL) return(NULL);
00295     cuddRef(var);
00296 
00297     if (level > (unsigned) depth) {
00298         E = zddPortToBddStep(dd,f,depth+1);
00299         if (E == NULL) {
00300             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00301             return(NULL);
00302         }
00303         cuddRef(E);
00304         res = cuddBddIteRecur(dd,var,Cudd_Not(one),E);
00305         if (res == NULL) {
00306             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00307             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
00308             return(NULL);
00309         }
00310         cuddRef(res);
00311         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00312         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
00313         cuddDeref(res);
00314         return(res);
00315     }
00316 
00317     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_zddPortToBdd,f);
00318     if (res != NULL) {
00319         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00320         return(res);
00321     }
00322 
00323     T = zddPortToBddStep(dd,cuddT(f),depth+1);
00324     if (T == NULL) {
00325         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00326         return(NULL);
00327     }
00328     cuddRef(T);
00329     E = zddPortToBddStep(dd,cuddE(f),depth+1);
00330     if (E == NULL) {
00331         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00332         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00333         return(NULL);
00334     }
00335     cuddRef(E);
00336 
00337     res = cuddBddIteRecur(dd,var,T,E);
00338     if (res == NULL) {
00339         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00340         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00341         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
00342         return(NULL);
00343     }
00344     cuddRef(res);
00345     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,var);
00346     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,T);
00347     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,E);
00348     cuddDeref(res);
00349 
00350     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_zddPortToBdd,f,res);
00351 
00352     return(res);
00353 
00354 } /* end of zddPortToBddStep */
